resources.string: Want to buy form another seller

Mulven.com is one of the fastest growing e-commerce platforms of Bangladesh. MULVEN was originated from MULTI VENDOR, as we believe that the more vendors there will be present ina platform the more diversified the marketplace will become.\n\nMulven has collaborated with hundreds of popular and recognised brands of Bangladesh working in various different product categories.We strive to make your online shopping experience as smooth as possible everyday.
Technical solution provider\n Hyder Technology & IT Solution
Mulven aims to spearhead the e-commerce service revolution in Bangladesh.
